front.title: KEM-based Authentication for IKEv2 with Post-quantum Security

abstract.t: This draft specifies a new authentication mechanism, called KEM (Key Encapsulation Mechanism) -based authentication, for the Internet Key Exchange Protocol Version 2 (IKEv2). This is motivated by the fact that some post-quantum KEMs (like ML-KEM) are more efficient than post-quantum signature algorithms (like ML-DSA).
